mapper.select: /* get_member */ SELECT idx, id, pw, name, sex, tel, age, address1, address2, company_idx, regdate, regid, moddate, modid FROM MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1
/* loginConfirm */ SELECT MENU_URL FROM MENU ORDER BY MENU_SNO LIMIT 1
/* admin.user..UserMapper.menuList */ SELECT IDX, MENU_NAME, MENU_PARENT_IDX, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_SNO, ACTIVE_ID, MENU_URL, ROLE_DETAIL_CODE FROM MENU WHERE MENU_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY MENU_SNO

/* admin.user.UserMapper.getMenuSubList */ SELECT IDX, MENU_NAME, MENU_PARENT_IDX, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_SNO, ACTIVE_ID, MENU_URL, ROLE_DETAIL_CODE FROM MENU WHERE 1=1 AND MENU_PARENT_IDX = #{MENU_SNO} AND MENU_LEVEL = 2 ORDER BY MENU_SNO
/* getRoleMenu */ SELECT MENU_URL FROM MENU ORDER BY idx ASC LIMIT 1
